code: export async function flag_project(project_id,user_id,reason,description){try{const response=await fetch('/projects/flag',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({project_id,user_id,reason,description})});if(!response.ok){const error=await response.json();throw new Error(error.message||"Failed to flag project");}return await response.json();}catch(err){console.error("Flagging failed:",err);throw err;}}
